content: this is a free pattern that is part of my all squared away series of blanket patterns additional design credit to maria saba this pattern was tested for colour blind accessibility by https //www color-blindness com/coblis-color-blindness-simulator/ it will also still make sense when printed in the black/white setting on your printer we highly recommend making a swatch with the yarn and hook you d like to use your finished blanket will measure approximately 6 5 times bigger than an 8-round granny square alas there are no 8-round squares in the design - don t cut the yarn if you d like to use this swatch in the blanket you can add or subtract rounds as desired this pattern uses the continuous joining method described in this tutorial https //www ravelry com/discuss/fantasticmio/4069169/1-25 or this video tutorial https //youtu be/lo40rxgsxpm this was an mcal - check out the thread here 1 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/fantasticmio/4192469/1-25
